snippet: Chris Kreider and Derek Stepan each scored their 20th goals and had an assist, and the Rangers beat the Blue Jackets to secure a sixth straight trip to the playoffs.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat Columbus Blue Jackets, 4-2; other ice hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Kreider and Derek Stepan each scored their 20th goals and had an assist, and the Rangers beat the Blue Jackets to secure a sixth straight trip to the playoffs.

headline.print_headline: Kreider and Stepan Help Rangers Clinch Postseason Berth
headline.main: Kreider and Stepan Help Rangers Clinch Postseason Berth
